job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Link to req https://boards.greenhouse.io/sonyinteractiveentertainmentplaystation/jobs/3365648   Back End Software Engineer for Machine Learning TeamLocation: San FranciscoDo you want to join a Machine Learning team committed to personalizing the PlayStation experience for millions of users? The work we do delivers impactful insights to build an increasingly dynamic and interactive experience! The Backend/server Software Engineer will deliver and optimize interactions across PlayStation experiences and systems by designing, building, testing and cost-effectively deploying real-time client-facing online Machine Learning service.We are looking for someone who can build delightful products and experiences for millions, in an agile environment, collaborating with teams-across Engineering, Product and Design. Further, you will be immersed in ML technologies, tools and processes, as you help to advance our technical objectives and architectural initiatives.This is a mid-level backend/server engineer position, but we will also gladly consider senior level candidates.Responsibilities:  - Design, build, deploy and maintain Java-based backend micro service that integrates with Machine Learning pipeline   
  - Optimize resource and infrastructure cost and extend micro service to use new technology   
  - Support production issues and actively serve on-call schedule   
  - Own the implementation end to end by effectively communicate with non-technical stakeholders on requirements and deliverables   
Qualifications:  - BS in engineering or computer science   
  - Proficiency in Java and knowledge in Python or Scala   
  - 3+ years of industry work experience in large scale and low latency Java/Kubernetes service that serves real-time customers.   
  - Machine Learning knowledge and experience is a big plus.   
Preferred qualifications:  - Experience with system distributed cloud-based environments, such as AWS.   
  - Experience with tech stacks such as Spark, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Prometheus.   
  - Experience with machine learning tools such as MLlib, Tensorflow, and scikit-learn.
